summary: A slacker awakes to find himself weak and wrapped in a webbing; after realizing that the world has been taken over by giant alien insects, he wakes a ragtag group of strangers and together they fight for survival.
cast: Chris Marquette|Brooke Nevin|Kinsey Packard|E. Quincy Sloan|Wesley Thompson|Linda Park|Deborah Geffner|Jim Cody Williams|Bru Muller|Ismael 'East' Carlo|Diane Gaeta|Ray Wise|Atanas Srebrev|Vlado Mihailov|Mike Straub|Todd Jenson|Dale R. Simonton|Rhoades Rader|Efram Potelle|Daniela Tonova|VJ Kewl|Todd Jensen|Kyle Rankin
title: Infestation
